Producer: Beau Flynn, Hiram Garcia, Dwayne Johnson, Dany Garcia
Screenwriter: Adam Sztykiel, Rory Haines, Sohrab Noshirvani
Production Co: New Line Cinema, Flynn Picture Company, Seven Bucks Productions
Rating: PG-13 (Sequences of Strong Violence|Intense Action|Some Language)
Synopsis: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the ancient gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam (Dwayne Johnson) is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.
Title: Black Adam
